summary: The video shows two cats, one with a pink phone and the other with a black phone, humorously representing a conversation between two people discussing their phones. The cat with the pink phone says 'Moi:' (Me:) and the cat with the black phone responds 'Lui:' (Him/her:). The text above them reads 'Pov: les appels avec mon clochard qui n'a jamais rien Ã  dire' (POV: calls with my loser friend who never has anything to say). The scene transitions to a bedroom with a bed and a floating phone, continuing the humorous theme.
keywords: cats, phone, conversation, humor, bedroom, POV, loser friend
